introduction: Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience across Microsoft, DP World, Amazon, and Rakuten India, specializing in the design and optimization of scalable backend systems and cloud-native applications. Proven track record in transforming legacy platforms into robust microservices, automating critical health checks and alerts for Azure Storage, and optimizing high-impact financial systems to improve performance and resilience. Highly skilled in Java, Spring Boot, Kafka, SQL, AWS/Azure, and passionate about mentoring, problem-solving, and driving technical excellence through innovative solutions, process improvements, and collaborative teamwork
